title: for cyberattacks
extract: A cyberattack is any type of offensive maneuver that targets computer information systems, infrastructures, computer networks, or personal computer devices. ... A cyberattack may steal, alter, or destroy a specified target by hacking into a susceptible system.
extract_html: A cyberattack is any type of offensive maneuver that targets computer information systems, infrastructures, computer networks, or personal computer devices. ... A cyberattack may steal, alter, or destroy a specified target by hacking into a susceptible system.
